title.rendered: NEMTEK SLIDING GATE CONTACT – INLINE SGC07

content.rendered:
The heavy duty sliding gate contact is used for series wiring of sliding gates with a robust construction using stainless steel and brass, making it suitable for outdoor use in most climates. The large location plates allow for increased tolerance and easier installation.

Features:

  • Heavy duty design
  • Large location plates allow for increased tolerance
  • Available with crimp lug connectors (SGC07)
  • Mounting the gate contact bracket available. (EA-SGC07ZB/HDG)
  • Material: UV stabilised Nylon
